name: March 7th
description: A spirited and quirky girl who was found sealed in a block of ice. She has no memory of her past, but she is optimistic and eager to discover her identity.

name: Dan Heng
description: A reserved and mysterious young man who wields a spear. He is the archivist of the Astral Express, and he is always calm and collected.

name: Herta
description: The master of the Herta Space Station, who appears as a puppet. She is a genius researcher with a sharp tongue and a passion for collecting rare and unusual things.

name: Asta
description: The lead researcher of the Herta Space Station, Asta is an energetic and curious girl from a wealthy family. She manages the station's affairs with boundless enthusiasm.

name: Bronya
description: The Supreme Guardian of Belobog, the last remaining city on the frozen planet of Jarilo-VI. She is a capable and determined leader who strives to protect her people.

name: Seele
description: A spirited and valiant member of Wildfire, the resistance organization in Belobog's Underworld. She is accustomed to being alone and wields a giant scythe with proficiency.

name: Jing Yuan
description: One of the seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance's Cloud Knights. A master tactician, he leads the Xianzhou Luofu with meticulous foresight.

name: Blade
description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, whose past is a mystery. He wields an ancient sword that is filled with cracks, just like his body and his mind.

name: Acheron
description: A Galaxy Ranger who walks the cosmos alone. Her true name is unknown, and she strikes with a long sword, swift and silent as a flash of crimson.

name: Black Swan
description: A Memokeeper of the Garden of Recollection. A mysterious and elegant soothsayer, she has a keen interest in the memories of others.

name: Pathfinder
description: A mysterious explorer from Amphoreus, a world yet uncharted. They are known for their resilience and knowledge of forgotten stellar pathways.

name: Stellarguide
description: A native of Amphoreus, possessing a unique connection to the stars. They guide lost travelers through the treacherous, shifting landscapes of their homeworld.
